bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus New Testament Papyri: "Not without Honor Except in Their Hometown" [Mark 6:4]?
bibl.note: Expanded version of the Presidential Address delivered on November 22, 2003, at the annual meeting of the Society of Biblical Literature in Atlanta, Georgia. - I. Introduction: Traditional and New Goals of Textual Criticism. - II. New Testament Papyri in Their Cultural and Intellectual Context. - III. Conclusion. - Pp. 21-35: P. Oxy. LXIII, 4365. A Letter about Lending Books: Jewish-Christian Issues and Women's Literacy and Leadership in Christianity at Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.seg: EPP Eldon Jay, The Oxyrhynchus New Testament Papyri: "Not without Honor Except in Their Hometown" [Mark 6:4]?

Expanded version of the Presidential Address delivered on November 22, 2003, at the annual meeting of the Society of Biblical Literature in Atlanta, Georgia. - I. Introduction: Traditional and New Goals of Textual Criticism. - II. New Testament Papyri in Their Cultural and Intellectual Context. - III. Conclusion. - Pp. 21-35: P. Oxy. LXIII, 4365. A Letter about Lending Books: Jewish-Christian Issues and Women's Literacy and Leadership in Christianity at Oxyrhynchus.
